name: tasha West
text: Dr . Fairburn and his staff are excellent and professional. I was very nervous about my procedure today. The entire staff made me feel comfortable and it didn't take long..

name: Lesley McRae
text:
They got me in quickly for a cracked tooth extraction. They were able to use the X-rays I had already paid for from my referring dentist. I opted out of anesthesia and Dr Carlson took good care to make sure I was feeling alright. Very reassuring chair side manner! In and out in less than 2 hrs (including paperwork and checkout)
Am home now only feeling dull pain have not even taken the codeine prescribed for me.
So far (day one) happy with the experience

name: Harold D L Robinson III
text: Excellent service and professional staff. I had oral surgery today and the experience was outstanding. I recommend University Oral & Facial Surgery clinic to handle all your needs present and future needs.

name: Laura Findlay
text: Dr. Carlson and his staff were very friendly and comforting. I would highly recommend University Oral Surgeons to anyone they may need their expertise.

name: Teresa Hannah
text: Dr. Link and the staff are all wonderful! Great service before and after surgery. I highly recommend them.

name: Della Minor
text: Dr Carlson done a wonderful job on my tooth extraction. He had the best bedside manner and listened to my concerns. The office staff was polite and caring as well. I like to thank them for their help with the unbearable pain I was having with the tooth.

name: Morgan Watson
text: Everyone I came in contact with was above and beyond nice! Made the experience as good as it could’ve been, considering I was scared to death. 5/5

name: Ralph Bauman
text: These folks are EXCELLENT! I was missing several upper teeth and they explained various alternatives,  including implants. I chose implants, and Dr. Fairburn explained the procedure and successfully put in two implants. It was painless. He is very gentle  and works well with his professional staff. University Oral & Facial Surgery is very clean and the entire staff is very professional and courteous, which is important during this Covid crisis. I highly recommend Dr. Fairburn for your oral surgery needs. Incredible.

name: Ricky Whitt
text: Amazing staff, very professional an make you feel so comfortable knowing I was nervous lol but my first ever experience and they made it look so easy!!!!

name: Lory Hiler
text: Dr Link was great. The office is very relaxing and makes you feels at ease. The staff was great too. Thank you for taking care of me

name: Danielle Guido
text: Dr. Crawford and his staff were so friendly and made my experience so comfortable!! I have severe dental anxiety and the staff were so helpful and accommodating to my needs!!! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who is looking for an oral surgeon!!

name: Suzanne Clement
text: Well coordinated, limited wait time and I really liked Dr Link and staff

name: Mariah Barkley Sullivan
text: I called and made an appointment almost 3 weeks ago to have a tooth extracted while under general anesthesia. I asked about prices for the procedure and inquired about getting an implant down the road. The lady I spoke with gave me a quote for everything including the bone graph required to have an implant done when healed. The price she gave me was $415, I do have dental insurance, but it still seemed lower than I was expecting. I asked her again to make sure I heard her correctly and wrote down everything she told me. Well I get there this morning and the Dr comes in to go over everything they are going to do and then another lady comes in to go over pricing again and get my payment info. She informs me that she saw the quote I was given in my notes, but she didn't know where the other lady had gotten those figures because they were not correct. She informs me it was going to be $992 for the exact same thing I was already quoted the much lower price of. I told her that I was not paying that price so she does some figuring on the computer and tells me $650ish without the bone graph to which I replied, I'm still not paying that price, she needs to go talk to the lady who quoted me the other price. She walks out for a few minutes and comes back in and says the other lady is not there today, but they can do everything but the graph for $476. I declined that price again and told her they should have to honor the price I was quoted, especially if it was in my notes. She said they could not do that, that it was just an estimate. Well I'm sorry, being quoted one price weeks ago only to get there today and it has more than doubled, is not an estimate to me. They never said it was an estimate, they specifically used the word quote! Needless to say, I am still dealing with a broken tooth because I refuse to pay more than double what I was told it was going to cost me out of pocket.

name: William Hall
text: Simply a horrible experience. First they lied to me twice. They really are just uncaring and the doctor Link laughed in my face when I told him about my long-term medical condition. At first I thought he was laughing about something else, but was clear. He seems to think my terminal disease that has been confirmed by two of the best neurological groups in the US is a joke. He changed my oral surgery without discussion, so I would need to come back for a second. And in my “unique “ case should not have any care for pain. Now I have to suffer through his malpractice. Simply, don’t go! He should have just stopped before he ever started cutting on me.

name: Jean Smith
text: Great place to go very friendly staff everything was great from start to finish.😊😊😊😊😊

name: Bianca Edwards
text: My experience today was overall a good. The staff was very polite and took safety precautions due to COVID. Mask were worn by everyone. The staff of nurses were professional and in-depth with all questions and concerns. Dr. Carlson also had great bedside manners and was well informed. First time visiting as adult, my experience was smooth with a decent wait.

name: Cynthia Stevens
text: Everyone was wonderful. The only bad experience I had was with the woman behind the desk upfront. The lady just inside the door was wonderful. This was the woman on the far left just inside. She was very rude and condescending. She gave me some papers and told me to run them out to my driver and run back. I am 69 years old and I don’t run anywhere anymore. I still have a 5 star rating because the other people in the office more than made up for her.

name: Joseph Anders Jr
text: I had a broken wisdom tooth for an entire weekend. Saw my dentist on Tuesday. They got me an appointment(due to a cancellation)Wednesday with Dr. Farnham. Everything went wonderfully from start to finish at University Oral and Facial Surgery. The ladies that work with Dr. Farnham noticed how nervous I was and made sure I was comfortable the whole time. Finally the good Dr. had that little tooth devil out of my mouth before I knew it. I’m pretty scared of dentist, but I would go back and see Dr. Farnham and his crew anytime, I just hope I don’t have to go back soon!

name: Brandy Heartsill
text: Fantastic job! I had big back molar extracted and a lot of anxiety about it. The whole team was so nice. So fast and efficient. Definitely put my safety first and my comfort. I couldn’t thank hem enough!

name: Ed Prince
text: This place has to the best oral surgeon in tuscaloosa,  maybe even in the state....very professional. I would recommend them to anyone...the procedure they do you wouldn't even know they're done...IT'S ABSOLUTELY AMAZING...THANK YOU UNIVERSITY ORAL AND FACIAL SURGERY...Really loved it all from the time I arrived...everyone was so nice...GREAT STAFF

name: m causey
text: Everyone from staff to doctors were very professional from the time I entered the office and they were very efficient. My appointment was on time and the procedure was performed as promised.  I highly recommend them.

name: Patricia Bryant
text: Very comfortable and calming environment and a very kind staff. Treated me as if I was the most important patient in the building. I will definitely go back to this office if there is ever a need to do so.

name: John Lewis
text: Great folks. Very nice and professional. I would highly recommend them

name: Ashley Addison
text: Very nice doctors and nurses also very helpful with everything that we need to have also feel very comfortable

name: Shirla Webster
text: I was treated very well by Dr Link and all of the staff here. They were all following COVID-19 guidelines. Every question was answered before I left the office so that my treatment will go smooth.

name: Darrel Jernigan
text: This was a fantastic visit. I went in for an emergency procedure. The office was complying with Covid-19 protocol. Very clean and plenty of space between patience. They put me at ease from the moment I walked in. The staff was courteous and friendly. I didn't have an appointment when I called to see if they were open. They referred me to the nurse before they would see me. It took only 1 minute for the nurse to call me back and get me in. The intake nurse was thorough. She didn't miss a beat. And she was easy to talk to. The doctor was great. He answered all of my questions and to great care to insure my comfort during the procedure. Management made payment hassle free and safe. I could not have asked for a better experience.

name: Jackie Stephens
text:
This was my first procedure at The University Oral & Facial Surgery. The office is pristine. The staff are kind, knowledgeable, and understanding. My procedure went very smoothly and quickly. The doctor and nurses were very aware of my ptsd and treated me with enormous compassion.
The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because I am a breast cancer survivor and alerted  them that I could not have blood pressure or IV sticks on my left arm. My IV was inserted in my right arm, however, when I woke up from surgery the blood pressure cuff was on my left arm!!!! That’s a big no-no as I will now run the risk of lymphedema.

name: Sonja Minor
text: Friendly and professional atmosphere. Dr. Carlson is an excellent dentist!

name: Pat Gregg
text: I was extremely impressed with their organization during this COVID19 pandemic. They had check in perfected, making sure people wore masks, social distanced, took temps, & kept contact to a minimum. The staff was friendly and professional and Dr. Link was very thorough. He explained my issue in a way I could understand & gave detailed instructions. I highly recommend this practice.

name: Stephen Quilliams
text:
I was totally overcharged for two extractions that was coded as surgical but was actually just regular pulled teeth. Charged 640.00 dollars for two extractions. On top of 95.00 dollars for exam and 20.00 for masks and gloves. Said it was because of covid 19. Absolutely the worst place to get teeth pulled,as far as cost is concerned and no sympathy for people who are struggling financially due to covid 19.
.

name: Alabama Choir School
text: This group is made up of pure, helpful, friendly professionals. From the lady taking temps at the front door, through to the nurses, receptionists, all the way to Dr. Carlson, 100% solid!

name: Natasha Wiant
text: I had the best experience with them. They took precautions prior to covid. They worked fast to get each person in and out in a safe and timely manor. With no hesitation they work with you and answer questions quickly for you. I will definitely be recommending them!!!

name: Gabriel Louise
text: Very pleasant and a great group of people.I would definitely go back and recommend the service.

name: cassie simon
text: Wonderful experience. My 85 year old mother is here with me. She does not live here. She’s been stuck here because of Covid.  Not only did they work her in for a serious oral mouth issue, but she had no dental insurance and she got a discounted rate. Everyone was very nice and she remarked to me that she felt good because they referred to her by Mrs. and her last name. A special shout out to Brandy.

name: Mary Parsons
text:
Unprofessional call to make a appointment!

Never been here but I called to schedule a appointment and let’s just say the phone call was enough for me not to go unfortunately.
I called was asked to hold sure no problem I don’t mind holding well the lady forgot to actually put me on hold.
Well I heard their conversation how omg girl the phones won’t stop ringing I already have like 69 sticky notes of names why couldn’t these people get their teeth fixed before the pandemic.
Well I said hello about five time someone one picks back the phone and says can I hold I said absolutely not and told her I heard their conversation and wanted to speak to the manger she says she’s not here I said well let me speak to someone over you finally after asking 3 times she had someone else named Ingrid come to the phone which she was nice and apologetic she said their office is over whelmed with calls since they were closed for 7 weeks which I completely understand it’s a known fact many places are overwhelmed.
But that does not take the place of being professional and doing what job you get paid to do I feel anyways I won’t be using them.

name: Tyreece Hampton
text: Very knowledgeable helpful staff and Dr. Link put together a good plan for me on my dental procedures.

name: Michael Ward
text: Highly professional staff. Dr. Carlson seemed VERY nice. He's a God fearing man and I felt very comfortable in his presence. If you have any maxillofacial work that needs to be done, you should seriously consider University Oral and Facial. They'll make you feel right at home!

name: Traci Morris
text: The surgical staff is wonderful,  but be prepared for a little bit of attitude from the office staff.

name: Tamika Stinson
text: I scheduled appointments for both my children and the day before the receptionist called verifying only one appt. I explained that I had 2 appointments scheduled she could not find the appt for the other child. I ask to reschedule the appt and she said that I need 48 hr notice.(which was a lie based on their website it’s a 24 hr notice. I literally stayed on the phone with this smart mouthed receptionist threatening me with a cancellation fee for their mess up!!! Finally after 15 minutes with this rude person someone else gets on the phone and said they found the other appt🤨!  The day of the procedure they tell me it will be a fee. ( she said they would call later the day prior) Of course that didn’t happen. At the appointment they gave me a price to pay (before they would see one child). I paid it, shortly after I was asked to pay for the other child🤯🤯 after she finished her appointment! One would think they would let me know both prices and pay for them together. Talking about frustrated with these people!!!! Never again!!

name: Stacey Evans
text: Everyone was FABULOUS from check in until the very moment I left. My father was with me and they kept him well informed on me and gave him perfect post-op instructions for me to follow as well as a bag full of information and goodies. I had never taken the medication I was given so I made an after hours call to the on-call nurse and she gave me instructions on how to get the full benefit of the medication to keep me comfortable over the weekend. While I have always been a nervous wreck with any dental work other than a cleaning, the entire staff that I encountered made it a pleasant experience and eased my mind. Thank you to everyone who I came in contact with that day. Keep up the wonderful work!

name: Becky Forrester
text: Dr. Carlson and his staff are so kind and caring. They really know how make you feel at ease. They took great care of my son who was very nervous going in. Thanks to you all!!!

name: Taril Slater
text: Very professional! Get u in and out in no time. Very nice staff as well.

name: Ray Carroll
text:
Dr. Carlson took time to exchange pleasantries without wasting time. Never felt he was “in a rush” to move out and on to his next appointment. He conveys a concern for doing highly professional procedures and caring for the patient.
The very personable lady who guided me out of the treatment room to the billing and waiting areas was a great touch. Not only was she very friendly but particularly in that I wasn’t turned loose in the rabbit’s warren of exam room doors and disorienting hallways to stumble onto the way out.

name: Ricky Burch
text: So professional from start to finish!  Everyone could not have been nicer and genuinely cared about my well being.  Very impressed, and Dr. Clausen is the best!  I hope I dont have anymore tooth problems but if I do, I will be back!  Thanks!

name: shalka ochilly
text: I was really scared going in being 3 months pregnant, but the process was quick and painless. One of the nurses even held my hand to calm me which meant a lot to me. Definitely recommend this office!

name: Bailey Park
text: Very disappointed in my experience. Went in for dental surgery today and the day before, I was told that my insurance covered it and I didn’t have to bring a co pay. I get in the room waiting for surgery and I’m told I needed to pay 1,045 dollars up front before I could get the surgery. No payment plans, no surgery, nothing. I drove an hour to have my time wasted. Don’t recommend.

name: Tina Turley
text: Dr. Links and his staff are lovely.  Handling things as best they can through this Covid 19 pandemic.nice environment.

name: Natanya Vance
text: They always take care of me when I come in. I will never go to another oral surgeon besides Dr. Farnham and Dr. Link.

name: Cody Kornegay
text: I was very happy with my experience here. The staff was friendly and made me feel less nervous about having a tooth removed. The procedure itself went smoothly and was very quick. They answered all of my questions and concerns about recovery. No complaints.

name: Rhonda Lancaster
text: I love Dr. Fairburn! He's the best dental surgeon/medical doctor ever!! I feel safe knowing he is working on my teeth.  I'm fixing to have him do my implants.  I have all the confidence in the world in everyone at University Oral and Facial Surgery.  I'm not scared to go at all!!!!! The office staff is also great and very helpful.  Love them all!!

resp.text:
Rhonda,

Thanks for letting us know that Dr. Fairburn makes you feel at ease. Our surgeon's experience is the cornerstone of our practice.

name: Calvin Williams
text: I just came from here to get extraction for a tooth that has been giving me nothing but trouble. Dr. Carlson and his staff were truly wonderful. I was nervous but was put at ease by the terrific customer service! Thank you very much UOFS!!!

name: Donnie Lee
text: Outstanding service, everyone was very friendly and professional, really practicing social distancing

name: Nikki Hahn
text: The office staff is one of a kind. They are helpful, patient, understanding and very kind. Dr. Fairburn has a great bedside manner and did my procedure perfectly. His support staff listened to my cares and concerns and discussed future plans before proceeding.  I did have to reschedule my apt but it was nobody's fault but my own because I was late arriving. Thank you to the staff and Dr Fairburn for a job well done. I'd highly recommend him and his team and I'll be returning for any future needs myself.

name: Hunter Sexton
text: We waited 2 HOURS for a 2 MINUTE consolation about wisdom teeth removal with Dr.Link. Absolutely terrible. They told us to get there 30 minutes early, so we did. We could’ve been an hour and a half late and still had too long of a wait. We had people that got there later than us go back first. They walked in about a minute before we were gonna walk out. If I could give zero stars I very much would. If you need anything oral or facial, go to Birmingham. You’ll leave and get home sooner than you will here. Not going back. Ever.

name: IAm Shonia
text: I would definitely recommend this place to everyone I know.  Dr. Mcilwain and his staff were very kind and made sure all my questions were answered both before and after our visits.  He made my daughter,  who was the patient,  feel very comfortable.  The atmosphere was very pleasant and clean.  Our wait time wasn't long at all. They also provided an after hours number for me to call in case there were any problems after my daughter's procedure.  So many people are in the medical field because jobs are very easy to find.  What all patients need from their caregivers first is compassion and I can truly say that is exactly what we were shown at this office.

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great experience with us!

name: JAMES NORRIS
text: Great experience, staff friendly and professional. Practically no wait time. I was in in out within 45 minutes. Dr. Carlson very courteous and professional and explained everything.

name: Kim Carver
text: Staff was very friendly and accommodating. Dr. Carlson is the best always has been.

name: Terry (Lynn) Harrell
text: I am very happy with the service I received from University Oral & Facial Surgery. I was having issues with my wisdom teeth so I dropped by their office to make an appointment. Amazingly, I was able to have the procedure done the very next day. The operation was very fast and painless and, although I was prescribed pain medication to take after the procedure, it was not needed. The follow-up examination was also fast and did not require any additional payment. They even refunded part of my co-pay as the extraction surgery was not as difficult as they thought it would be. I would definitely recommend UOFS to anyone who needs dental surgery.

resp.text:
Terry,

Thanks for taking the time to leave us some feedback about your experience.
We are glad to hear that you were pleased with the surgery.

name: Sonya Blanton
text: Dr. Carlson and everyone I came into contact with here was amazing!  Thank you so much for your genuine care and concern!  I wish I could have all my dental care at this office!  Thank you all so so much! 😁

resp.text:
Sonya,

Thanks for letting us know how we're doing.
Our goal is to deliver the highest level of surgical care to our patients.

Do you think there is anything we could have done to make the experience smoother or more informative?

Regards,
Chris Pereira
University Oral & Facial Surgery
cpereira@uofsdocs.com

name: Tom Blackmon
text: Dr Roe and his staff have been kinda like family.  Whatever I needed, any questions I had and doing their work to my satisfaction.  They really did give me a reason to smile again.  I most likely will schedule visits to my home State of Alabama to retain the service I have received there as I now reside in Missouri.

resp.text:
Tom,

Dr. Roe is a great local dentist!
But I think you might have his practice confused with ours. His practice is right down the street from us.
Thanks for your time.

name: Nicole Samuel
text: I'm hella paranoid of dental offices however Dr. Carlson made me feel at ease. He was very gentle when administering the topical anesthetic and was very knowledgeable. He could probably sense how anxious I was and he was mindful enough to keep involved in the procedure by every once and a while informing me of what he doing in my mouth. All in all one one my most pleasant dental visits in my life. and ALLL the staff were super friendly!

name: Lakeidra Mims
text: Really great staff and wonderful experience. The consultation and procedure was quick and my recovery speedy. I encountered no problems. I had 3 wisdom teeth removed.

resp.text:
Lakeidra,

Thanks for letting us know about your experience.
Do you think there is anything we could have done better? We are always looking to improve.

name: Johnnie Campbell
text: I had a pleasant experience with my visit yesterday. The staff is very friendly and professional. Dr Meriwether is the best. He explained the procedure and made sure that I was comfortable throughout the procedure. I highly recommend this place for all of your dental care.

resp.text: That's great to hear about Dr. Merriwether,  but I think you may have us confused with Tuscaloosa General Dentistry just up the street.

name: Valerie Duncan
text: Dr. Carlson was great and did a wonderful job when I had my wisdom teeth removed.  He was very personable and had an excellent "chair side" manor.  I highly recommend him to everyone.

resp.text:
Valerie,

Thanks for letting us know. It is important to us that our patients feel comfortable during these types of procedures.  Thanks again for your kind words.

name: Chelsie Booth
text: These people really care. They are understanding and smart and try to make your experience with them as painless as possible. Thank you for all your help dr's looking forward for my wisdom teeth extraction. I know i picked the right place to go.

name: Johnnie Knight
text: The staff at University Oral and Facial Dentistry were very curtious, and professional. They made sure I understood my proceedure, and made me feel comfortable, even though this was my first visit I just felt like I was I was in good hands. I recommend them highly and if I had to do it all again I would choose  University Oraand Facial. 😁

name: Angie Sanders
text: Dr. Link removed my wisdom teeth over 25 years ago, my husband's wisdom teeth over 15 years ago and my daughter's wisdom teeth last month.  We all had great experiences.  We will be using him for my son's teeth next.

resp.text:
Angie,

Thank you for the great review!
We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us—it is so cool to know that Dr. Link has spanned two generations in your family.

name: Deloris Gray
text: I recommend Dr. Fairburn and this office. They were very caring. My husband had a procedure done and no problem with healing.

name: Gary White
text: Dr John Farhnam took care of a stone in my saliva gland that has been there for at least 3 years with out facial surgery that 2 previous doctors wanted to do.  Done in 10 minutes.  My best doctor experience ever.

name: David Fincher
text: The staff and Dr. Fairburn were great.  It went so much better than I ever thought it would.  Thanks to all.

name: niela askew
text: They were very professional and welcoming. Also it was quick service too, they made sure I was comfortable before my procedure. Days after the procedure someone called to check on me . I will definitely recommend them to anyone.

resp.text:
Niela,

Thanks for letting us know about your experience.

name: Crimson Dynasty
text:
We were sent here by our local dentist when he felt that my daughter's gum abscess needed a drainage tube put in her mouth then cut out her back teeth. When the surgeon reviewed the large x-ray, it was decided to remove just 1 tooth and he cleaned out all infection underneath it with hopes that the 2nd tooth will live.
We were also worked in on the spur of the moment because of the abscess. Very grateful they gave her other tooth a chance to live since she's still in her 20's.

name: David Taylor
text: Fast appointment,safe environment great service.👍

name: Omar Elsoukkary
text: Had 3 impacted wisdom teeth and 1 erupted wisdom tooth causing so much pain. Dr. Farnham assured me that the procedure would be a piece of cake and it was. Very happy with the service and worth every penny to have him operate on you!

name: Jessie Howard
text: Great experience with wonderful, friendly staff! I was wrll taken care of with great aftercare instructions. Full top extractions with no issues. I highly reccomend University Oral and Facial surgery.

name: Marcie Wood
text: Most wonderful experience I’ve ever recieved at a Medical appointment! From the Reception desk to Dr Bennett’s chair I was treated excellent! Would definitely recommend University Oral!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Marcie!

name: Rachel Fuller
text: Dr. Fairburn was great! Surgery was quick and he was friendly.

name: Sonya Hollis
text: We were referred to UOFS for 3rd molars by our regular dentist. From the first step of setting up the appointment to the check out process, everything and everyone was fantastic. I love the fact that most all paperwork is done online, this eliminates the in office wait time. The doctor we seen was very nice and answered any question I had. I would most definitely recommend UOFS to my friends and family.

resp.text:
Sonya,

Thanks for your review, our goal is a 5-star surgical experience for every patient.
Is there anything we could have done better?

name: Donna Rios
text: The staff was informative and polite! Definitely a place I would recommend! Nurse even called to check on my son after we got home!

resp.text:
Donna,

Thanks for sharing!

name: Tim Crowell
text: Outstanding staff, everyone was great.

name: Thedà Mallette
text: I would give the personnel and doctors an A+.  They are very competent and their  personalities make you feel like you're in good hands.

name: Lashanda Hatcher
text: Excellent staff and very good service and they took good. Care of me from the time I arrived till the time I left

name: Terrie Monroe
text: The entire staff was wonderful and eased all of my anxiety and fears. They made me feel very comfortable and answered all of my questions. I would highly recommend University Oral and Facial Surgery to all of my friends and family.

resp.text:
Terrie,

Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. The surgical staff at University Oral & Facial Surgery strive to deliver an exceptional level of care to our patients.

Do you think there is anything we could have done to make the experience smoother or more informative?

Regards,
Chris Pereira
University Oral & Facial Surgery
cpereira@uofsdocs.com

name: brenda goodwin
text: If you want really good care, a caring and compassionate oral surgeon go see Dr. Fairburn!  He and his staff are wonderful!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Brenda.

name: Greg Hill
text: I was kept waiting 2 1/2 hours past my appointment for a simple extraction for which I was charged $250.00. Not one apology or explanation for the unconscionable delay. It would be difficult to justify going back to them.

I would like to learn more about what happened during your visit. Please contact me at your earliest convenience.

cpereira@uofsdocs.com

Chris Pereira
UOFS

name: mike paciello
text: Friendly,efficient staff did a fantastic job.Dr Link is a gem.He extracted 2 wisdom teeth and put in an implant in 35 minutes and I didn't feel a thing. Highly recommended!!

name: Latorian Aaron
text: I would recommend University Oral & Facial Surgery to anybody, they did a great job on my mouth....

name: Donna Johnson
text: I would highly recommend University Oral & Facial Surgery to anyone that's having problems with their teeth. I will give them five stars 😁.

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback Donna!

name: Cassondra Pitts
text: Great staff and awesome doctor!

name: Deborah Boothe
text: My experience at University Oral and Facial Surgery has been with Dr. Fairburn.  He is friendly, professional and does excellent work.  My dental implants have been successful and I wouldn't consider using anyone else!!!

resp.text: Deborah, we are so glad you had a wonderful and successful experience with us!

name: Christy Nelson
text: It was a great place never had any pain everyone was considerate and I had 3 teeth removed no stress at all

resp.text:
Thanks for the great review!
Do you think there is anything we could have done better?

name: Kimberly Chappell
text: Very professional and clean. Staff is very friendly and courteous. I had Dr. Farnham and he was awesome. The wait time is a bit long but I didnt mind because they were very awesome people.

resp.text: Kimberly, we are glad you had a great visit with us! we apologize for the wait, we do the very best we can to make sure our patients are moving as quickly as possible but yet taken care of in a proper time frame as well. :) Thank you for the rating!

name: Lasandra Cooper
text: I hate going to the dentist but everyone in this office was very nice and made me feel welcomed which made my visit there very pleasant.

resp.text:
Lasandra,

I am glad to hear we were able to make you feel at ease.

name: Betty Hopkins
text: Very nice and pleasant atmosphere and when you walk in the place you feel loved and not scared.

resp.text:
Betty,

We pride ourselves on our Doctors' "Chairside Manor". Thanks for taking the time to leave a review.

name: Chris Kizziah
text: Great place to have a extraction.

name: Lisa Sanders
text: From the Front desk to the actual surgery to the followup call made by staff, a wonderful experience

resp.text:
Lisa,
Thanks for the feedback!

name: Angie Allison
text: Great staff and very friendly!  would highly recommend them.

name: Chip Till
text: The entire staff was extremely compassionate. You could tell each one has a servants heart.

name: deborah khalil
text: I had 2 teeth extracted by Dr Fairburn. The first of which he had out before I knew anything was going on. The second I was not so lucky.  The tooth  would not let go and come out so it had to be broken up by drilling and removed in pieces . Then came the packing, cauterizing and suturing all of which was not pleasant to say the least BUT Dr Fairburn was amazing, He never lost his cool. He was constantly explaining what was going on and what he was doing which helped to calm me. He even would pause and give me a minute to take a break. I am  not the easiest patient to deal with as I have a fear of dentist. He was very professional but also compassionate and kind which is rarely seen in today's medical profession. I am a RN of 30 plus years and I would recommend Dr Fairburn highly.  He has my utmost respect and admiration.

name: Latoya Adams
text: Well unfortunately we (my daughter and I) didn’t have the best experience with the nurse at this facility or the front office worker. The Dr. did have good bedside manner in my opinion, however, my daughter did seem to have some unusual extreme swelling even after 48 hrs  following the instructions of icing the area etc. I’m not absolutely sure why this occurred but the office has been emailed and I’m still awaiting a response. I have a rare genetic disease that unfortunately my daughter has the gene for and if not carefully watched certain medications given can turn the gene into the disease. I wasn’t informed what type of medications they planned to give her prior to the procedure when I asked to know the nurse seemed to have an attitude and reluctantly told me to come back to see. While back there talking about the list with the doctor the incompetent nurse proceeded to start my daughters I.V. Instead of at least waiting until we had finished determining if the medications were indeed okay all while rolling her eyes. Which was so disrespectful I can’t even imagine how such a person in a field of care could show such disregard but I guess that’s how she was raised to be. I’m not sure. However, there are two office staff members that are always most helpful that sit on the side. The lady at the front when you walk in was not very thorough she didn’t make sure I had the cost information prior to the day of the procedure in writing (I had to ask for it as well as the code explanations), she also didn’t make sure my daughter had an excuse for school but did offer one to the Caucasian lady that came in after me just not to me for some reason 😒. However the lovely lady on the side provided what I needed which I am most grateful for. As I said there are good staff members it’s just probably half good, half bad but the doctor was nice 50% of his staff I would say need some serious retraining and empathy towards others if they are going to stay in that field or look for another industry where care isn’t essential.

name: Susie Shelton
text: My daughter had severe pain and swelling for more than 3 weeks following wisdom teeth removal in October. We returned 4-5 days after surgery for a re-check. Dr. Hudson had very poor bedside manner and was very condescending to my 22 year old. They also charged $100 over quoted price out of pocket. We had another daughter scheduled for consult but changed oral surgeons and had wonderful experience in December at North Alabama Oral Surgery. We do not recommend Dr. Hudson.

name: Charlotte Sharpe
text: Dr. Hudson was the sweetest and kindest man.  He explained every step he was going to take from when he was making the incision to pulling the tooth.  He and his staff were just precious.  Would highly recommend him.  Charlotte Sharpe

name: Monique Fisher
text: Got all four of my wisdom teeth removed. I had insurance that wasn’t well known & they accepted it. I felt comfortable the entire time. I also got put to sleep and woke up just fine. Recovery was good & it put my mind at ease. Glad they are out & I recommend them!

name: Daniel Marchand
text:
My wife had a fantastic experience here, glad we found a good oral surgeon who takes our insurance (United Healthcare) locally. Everything was billed correctly, great coordination with the insurance company,  great staff, procedure went smoothly (tooth extraction) - happy customer!

The other place (also in-network) we went to charged $81 for an initial consultation (due to incorrectly coding services) plus quoted upwards of $200-300 to do an extraction (same insurance), we paid $66 TOTAL here and the consultation was 100% covered as it's supposed to be.

I hope we don't need to use this place again, but if we need an oral surgeon we're coming back for sure.

name: youknowit158
text: Dr. Hudson has horrible bedside manner! However he is amazingly great Doctor! For me it's more important for the doctor to be good at his job than have a good bedside manner. That's why I gave him a five star. His staff on the other hand is quite friendly and very professional.

name: M N
text: Dr. Clint Hudson was the absolute worst experience with a medical professional we have encountered. His arrogance and lack of empathy made for terrible bedside manner. After removing all four of our 16 year old daughters wisdom teeth on July 3rd, she was in recovery longer than anticipated. I waited patiently until I was called back to sit with her. She apparently hadn’t  tolerated the  Anastasia well. They released her to be taken home while her eyes were literally still rolling back in her head as the nurses walked her out. Over the long holiday weekend, dry sockets formed. I realize this is something that sometimes happens and isn’t necessarily the fault of the surgeon. My daughter was in agony, with pain medication doing nothing to dull her pain. When I called the after hours emergency number, listed on the discharge instructions sheet provided to us, they were completely useless. I seriously don’t even know why they have one. I was rudely told twice, once by the after hours staff member who answered the phone and again by Dr. Hudson himself to “call the office during regular business hours to schedule an appointment. “  At that point, I debated going on to the ER, but decided to have her at Dr. Hudson office as soon as they opened the following morning. We arrived 15 minutes prior to opening, signed in 2nd, only to be “worked in” to the schedule. While my daughter sat in the waiting room in misery, no urgent attention was shown. When we were finally called back, dr. Hudson examined and packed a bottom socket. My daughter did not receive relief as the dr. and his staff insisted she would. She kept trying to tell them the pain was coming from the upper socket which Dr Hudson and his assistant would NOT hear of, nor would he even look at.  They told us repeatedly she was wrong, and the pain she felt wasn’t coming from the upper socket, bc it was basically unheard of to develop an upper dry socket. They also repeatedly tried to get us to leave,  saying she would feel better in 15-30 minutes. I finally stated that I wasn’t leaving with her until I knew she was relieved. Dr. Hudson then SHOVED his hand into the top of her mouth asking “is THIS where you’re uncomfortable?!?” She grimaced and moaned in pain and tears flowed. Even I began crying just watching the scene. I absolutely was in shock and disbelief at what had just happened. Then, he stepped back and admitted it appeared to be an upper dry socket. He also admitted he couldn’t remember the last time he’d packed an upper, and that he didn’t know that he ever had. Once it was packed, she did get relief from the pain within a few minutes. I suppose Dr. Clint Hudson is an adequate surgeon so long as the patient doesn’t have any complications from the surgery, and if the complications aren’t rare or unusual. If there are complications, better hope they only occur during regular office hours. Since there is no way of knowing beforehand if these will occur, I’d suggest finding a different oral surgeon. I believe in giving credit where it is due, and there was an assistant who works for Dr. Hudson named Micki who was very sweet and sympathetic. On the flip side, another who I believe name was Jan was as rude and uncaring as the Dr. himself.

name: Pamala DeWerff
text: My experience is I got referred by my dentist because he was a TMJ specialist. Went for appt he came in room looked at X-rays from my dentist. He did not examine or xray me. Said he would have to resend me to a dentist in another town. Then I got bill for $190. Don’t waste your time or money. Tried to talk to staff and they were rude and argumentative. Again save your money and time.

text: Had two teens go his staff was great and the doc was firm but good.

name: Klemen Esber
text:
Was not treated very well. I got to the appointment 15 minutes early and still I waited over 45 minutes after my appointment time to go in to see the doctor.

When i got into see the doctor he check my mouth and confirmed to me that i did not have space and that i did need a wisdom teeth surgery.
I didn't really get to talk much, the doctor didn't really say anything about the procedure at all, except that I will be put under.
I asked a question about post op and he said “the nurse would answer my questions” and proceeded to leave the room.
She didn't explain any post op questions, and just told me to have someone bring me for the procedure since i cant drive after surgery and gave me a paper explaining that I cant drink/eat 8 hours prior. Again not answering any of my questions.

I expected to be able to schedule my appointment for the actual surgery and have that all scheduled and at least to know an amount that the surgery would cost. She proceeded to tell me that they will call me to answer everything and to schedule the procedure.
Then, Walked me out the back door!
Not telling me time frame or anything.

If that's how they treat the patients in a consult how can i be confident enough to let someone put me under and then do an operation on me?

Essentially. If everything is done by phone and they already have my x-rays from my dentist. Then why did i need to go in the first place? I was in there for less than 10 minutes. I still came out empty handed and with more confusion.

Amendment: When i got called to schedule my appointment, turns out that the person in the appointment was not the nurse it was an assistant nurse. Nurse Kristin sat with me on the phone for over an hour and explained the procedure to me and she was very kind and understanding. Knowing this I will give it 3 stars instead of 1. Still, just try to go in and be adamant to be treated well instead of in a rush.

text: Excellent care and service.  Had a scheduled surgery to remove a bone growth in the bottom of my mouth.  Entered the Madison office at 7:45 for my scheduled 8am surgery appointment. Didnt feel the needle going in and fell asleep shortly after with the next thing being told they were done and my son was waiting to take me home.  I was back home by 9am.  Followed their instructions and haven't had any excess bleeding or any other complications.  Would highly recommend them to anyone needing facial surgery services in the future.

text: They were very efficient at the office and very professional.  Yes, I would highly recommend them.

name: Tish Bergantz
text: Professional staff but waited over an hour for consult.

name: Arlan Busk
text:
The dental surgery was phenomenal! I had two teeth extracted and had ZERO pain in either location. My only issue was the wait time to see the doctor. (about 50 minutes) I understand some procedures take longer than anticipated, yet the emphasis seems to be maximizing the doctor's time with total disregard for the patients' time. I have a problem with that.
However, for my follow-up visit, I was called to the waiting room at my scheduled appointment time, and moved to a procedure room less than two minutes later.  Good show!

name: Dominica Johnson
text: The doctor and nurses were great! They answered all questions and allowed me to make the best decisions for my care.

name: v Coffey
text: Follow up surgery for the tooth implant went well.  No waiting, everything is efficient with caring staff.  I highly recommend this place.  When being put under, especially under COVID conditions so there on your own, that is important.

name: Ebony Marks
text: So far.. so good. I went to my dentist on Tuesday to look at my wisdom tooth (which was bothering me), and she referred me to Dr. Shaw. I was able to get in for a consult that same afternoon (which was amazing). Once I arrived, there was a bit of a wait (12:45 appointment, but seen at 1:15). Nonetheless, Dr. Shaw and Cassidy were amazing! I'm scheduled to get my wisdom teeth removed on Friday. I'll be sure to follow up with another review once my surgery/recovery is complete!

name: victor jolley
text: I came here in May 2019 to have a tooth pulled. Good service. After a week of checking, it was determined that with my Blue Cross insurance, I would still need to pay $385.00 in advance. Kinda pricey, but the tooth hurt, so I paid. Everything was great until they added an extra 1000 bucks to the bill AFTER the tooth was pulled. . Do they do this to everybody? Was it an accounting error? All I know is they overcharged me, then sent the extra bill to collections when I refused to pay.

name: Jay Chandler
text: I recently had a tooth extraction performed at NAOFS and I was very pleased with the entire process.  From the initial consult session to the actual procedure the entire process was timely and the results were very good.

name: Shelley Womack
text: I could not recommend a better group of people and staff to care for your oral surgry needs. I broke my wisdon tooth and was in IMMENSE PAIN. They fit me in same day to get a consultation, and despite their hectic alrwady overbooked schedule, they were kind enough to fit me into an impossible day for them. I cannot thank them enough, the staff, assistants, and oral surgeons! Everyone was so kind, understanding, compassionate, and professional. THANK YOU!

name: Irene Bussey
text: Thanks to the staff for doing it right. They are the model for how to care for patients during a COVID crisis.

name: Christy Gabardi
text: Dr. Shah and his staff are exceptionally friendly. My 11 yr old daughter was very nervous about her appointment, and Dr. Shah did fantastic with her. His wonderful sense of humor had her laughing so it helped ease her nervousness. He is really great with children! He is also very knowledgeable and helped me understand everything completely. Very thorough!

name: Jonathon Proffitt
text: Very professional staff and did an awesome job on my four teeth pulled. Highly recommended thank you again.

name: Dennis Fitzgerald
text: Consultation with Dr Guffey today.  Answered all my questions and concerns.  Terrific!

name: Misty Fitzgerald
text: We really enjoyed our visit here. The staff and doctors were great.

name: Greg Alsbrooks
text: Absolutely no issues. Wonderful experience. The nurse were all congenital and cute.

name: James Jeffries
text: Fantastic group of people from top to bottom. Very pleasant and very informative.

name: kaina locke
text: this was my first visit to dr.shah the office personnal was very nice and actually made you feel like you were  welcome Dr.Shah was very nice went over every little detail of what was going to happen with me having alot of health issues he was concerened about the procedure so he said what dr's of mine he would be contacting to make sure they thought i could do it the office was very welcoming i would defintely recommend them

name: Nick Ramesh
text:
Everyone was very nice & helpful...The ladies were very helpful over the phone before appointment concerning my dental plan coverage.

All the secretaries & assistants were very kind & helpful.  Lady that did my xray was very nice & patient with me with my jewerly, etc :)

then the dentist I met to do surgery procedure was very kind & professional, and can do surgery just 2 days after my consult appointment...which I am very greatful to & for!!

name: Erline Balentine
text: I highly recommend North Alabama Oral, Dr. Chris Bannon and staff were very professional and kind. Somehow they did great work with little pain.

name: Harold Renneberg iii
text: Check in was quick and easy. Dr Shaw explained the procedure and answered all my questions.

name: jonathan clark
text: This place is awesome. Looking forward to my follow up appointments. Great staff and amazing nurses.  Dr Shah is the man !!!   No pain from the I V, everyone has always been so nice.

name: Cindy Hudson
text: Professional service. Great result and great doctor. Masks a priority. Felt safe and in good, capable hands.

name: donnie smith
text: Professional, in and out in 45 mins!

name: Village Veterinary Clinic
text: Supper impressed so far. I have been dragging my feet about getting my wisdom teeth out. On Monday I FINALLY asked my Dentist for a referral. I called that morning and was able to get in with the specialist that afternoon for an Eval. ( I am sure this isn't normal, I just got lucky) At my appointment I was taken back not long after I arrived. I was immediately whisked back to get my x-ray done and it only took moments.The doctor came in not long after putting me in a room and was very direct about what was needing to be done and going over risks. At check out they were able to provide me with an estimate for my surgery which was scheduled for later in the week. I walked away with all my questions answered. I feel like they are a very efficient and organized office.

name: Michael Smith
text: I got surgery yesterday here, extracting 7 total teeth. Dr. Banan, (I do not think I spelled that correctly) as well as the front desk staff have been awesome and very responsive too my onslaught of questions. I have felt 0 pain without painkillers since the surgery! I will most definitely be using this office for any further oral operations! I have had mortifying experiences with multiple dentists and they made me feel very comfortable, if you have a fear, come here! I remember arriving and getting an IV, then I was in my car on the way home! Thank you guys for awesome service and customer service all around!!!

name: Kelly Kennedy - Huntsville, AL
text: Everyone was friendly and efficient.

name: Aaron Moody
text: I have zero complaints, I have put getting my wisdom teeth out for the better part of ten years until this year when it was either do it now or have permanent issues. The staff and doctors are very knowledgeable! They have a great system in place to get surgery’s done in less than a hour and have you on your way home with in my personal opinion minimal pain. I hope to never need them again, but If I do I’ll gladly go back!

name: Rebecca Zugaro
text: I appreciate the frankness of Dr. Shaw and the professionalism of the staff.

name: NoLimit95
text: Went to have a tooth extracted and Dr. Bannon was the surgeon. He was very nice and explained everything that I needed to know. The tooth had to be surgically removed and I didn't feel anything. I was given nitrous oxide and didn't like it, but that's just me. Dr. Bannon noted it for future reference and also apologized, but it wasn't his fault. I do need more work done and I'll definitely be going back to him. The ONLY downside to the whole visit was the wait time. 10:30 appt and I left at 1:40

name: Sheryl Payne
text: Went in for my consultation appointment and was very satisfied.  Check-in was easy - I completed my paperwork online and not a long wait at all to be called back.  Clean office.  My Nurse/Tech and Dr. Shah were the best part of whole experience.  I felt they were sincere in wanting to give me the best care possible.  Scheduling my next visit and check out was easy.

name: LeRoy Sperr
text:
The  extraction of my teeth went well and Dr. Guffey is very helpful. The rub comes when you need help later. They are friendly enough but slow to respond. I would think that if a patient was having a problem that was causing discomfort  that they should attend to it quickly not put it off for days. I have had a sharp sliver of tooth work it's way out and is cutting my tongue. It would take 30 seconds to remove it and instead it will be 4 days before they will see me after waiting half the day  for them to call me back.
I find this very bad customer care for a profession that is supposed to be the up most in care.For the prices they charge I expect better.

name: Amelia “MaeMae” Mae
text: Dr Shah was great!!! He was so nice and made me feel better about an issue that has been going on for a few weeks. The staff is really nice......the office is really busy but I expect to wait any time I go to a dr or dentist so no complaints!!!!

name: janice mitchell
text: Staff and doctor were very friendly and efficient. Also, I appreciate the social distancing and the cleanliness of the facility.

name: Sally Priester
text: Lovely staff and good information - I would have liked to have a full paper receipt for payments rather than just a copy of a credit card receipt. I file for insurance savings plan and a credit card receipt is meaningless for reimbursement.  Otherwise, a good experience.

name: LONA BISHOP
text: Great environment. Very helpful and friendly. Very clean atmosphere!

name: Awakening To The Universe
text: Seriously the best surgeon and most incredible staff! They worked with me to get me in and do what needed to be done to get me feeling better so fast! Miranda,  Dr. Shah, Stefanie and Kathy are the best team in the dentistry business. They are super friendly and make you feel like a family member not just a patient or a number. I highly recommend this place to anyone I cant even explain how thankful i am for their great work and amazing hospitality.

name: Christopher Abell
text: There are two parts to this review - the office policies - and the actual surgery review.  I'm sure there's a reason for requiring patients to have a driver present, but, it is very difficult to find somebody (on short notice) to just stop their day to sit in a room.  Like I said, I assume there is a reason, but it added a bit more stress to the situation... Other than that, the procedure went without a hitch. Rocky (the surgeon) was great, and it was over before I knew what had happened. His staff was also very personable.  They called me a few hours later to see how I was doing. A nice touch!

name: Tami M
text: Super friendly staff and well organized.  This was my first visit and the doctor was very nice and answered all my questions.

name: Nate Sharp
text:
They most unprofessional practice. Dr. Shaw & Holly Nation canceled my appointment prior to my arrival. I requested off work early, drove from downtown Huntsville to Madison to a canceled appointment.

Find a better practice who care more about there clients, NORTH ALABAMA DONT!

name: Mike L
text: Dr. Shaw and his staff were great!  Highly recommend!

name: kendra baker
text: They were amazing. I was in so much pain and they made it go away. They were all so nice to me and help me understand  what was happening.  I get they really cared about my pain and issue. And got to me fast. I will recommend  them to everyone.

name: Georgia Valrie
text: I commend the staff at North Alabama Oral and Facial Surgery; they are very professional, friendly and courteous. It makes me feel very special when you walk in the door and they greet you by your name. Indeed, they get to know their patients, and I truly appreciate it. Dr. Shah is superb and he has a pleasant smile. He ensures that the patient is pleased with the service rendered. You are able to ask him questions and he provides the answers which comforts the patient. I highly recommend them to others. Whenever, I have additional needs for oral surgery. I will certainly contact them. Thank you, Dr. Shah and staff for the excellent services that you provide to others. Blessings to all!

name: Brianna Monroe
text: I went with my mom for a 3:30 appointment and I sat in the waiting room until 4:20. My mom asked the woman at the front desk why we had not been called at the time of our appointment and we were told a wait is always 1 hour or more. That’s crazy and unorganized. Service was great when they took us but no one should have to wait an hour for a wisdom teeth consultation that lasted a total of 15 minutes.

name: Maci Willis
text: Dr Shah is hands down the best oral surgeon around!  He’s done procedures on two of my children and I will use him again in the future.  His assistants and nurses are also top notch.

name: Bob Pietrs
text: I went in for an evaluation. Dr. Shaw and staff were expert and friendly. Dr. Shaw took the time to answer all of my questions and evaluate all options.  I would feel comfortable going in for oral surgery and implants. The office staff are friendly and efficient.  Since I went to the Madison, AL office, I was able fill out patient information online ahead of my appointment.

name: Joy Dilg
text: Friendly people, well run.

name: Shoes4School
text: This is THE most professional, friendly place I’ve EVER visited. Everyone was so knowledgeable. My biggest fear in life is being put to sleep to have a procedure done. Everyone made me feel so comfortable, and I was in and so fast I didn’t even realize I was done. The staff and doctors here are by far THE BEST IN ALABAMA!!!!

name: Charlotte Petty
text:
They are always so caring and take the time to answer questions    I certainly would recommend them.   Great doctors and staff
👍

name: J Kindred
text: First, the front office staff is very friendly and gives a great first impression of what you can expect from the entire visit. Second, the nursing staff is outstanding! So kind and understanding. I have a horrible dental phobia. I made this clear to the ladies upon check in. They were diligent in alerting the nurses and doctor. Lastly, I was referred to Dr. Shah by Dr. Williamson at Harvest Dental. I needed surgical tooth extraction. I was so nervous. But starting with the office staff, through to the nurses and Dr. Shah I was treated with kindness and compassion. Dr. Shah is an amazing oral surgeon and a compassionate human being. He and his staff have committed themselves to providing the most outstanding service. I am grateful to have a dental team so committed to excellence!

name: Brian Morris (c4brian)
text: I went in for a consultation for an implant, and the prices were not as high as I was expected, and Dr. Rocky S. is very informative and great bedside manner.

name: Kreigan Hopkins (Antherian)
text: Ten hours after surgery right now, four wisdom teeth and the root of tooth number nine out. Process was smooth, they put me under quickly. The process took about two hours I was told. They were all very nice from the front desk, and into the room. Apparently I was talkative afterwards as this was my first surgery and I had allot of questions, but they didn't seem to mind. They let me use a pen and paper to talk since I had gauze in my mouth, and my mouth was numb and swollen. As of right now, I'm glad I went here. I would highly recommend them if you're looking to have work done. Should anything come up my reviews are always subject to change.

name: Gina Bradshaw
text: Took 1 hour 15 min to get into an exam room.  We arrived early and had all paper work filled out, they just over scheduled and wasted my time. Other than that they were fine.

name: John Spillman
text: Very friendly staff and pleasant atmosphere. They took time to answer any questions that I had and made it a positive experience.

name: Alan Burkett
text: First off, I have a phobia of dentist. But I must say that from the moment I walked into the office the entire staff made me feel comfortable, welcome, and at ease. The doctor took his time to explain what was going on with my cracked tooth and the procedure necessary to correct it. I would highly recommend this establishment to my friends and strangers alike.

name: Molly Brown
text: Dr. Shah and staff are amazing. I’ve had two surgeries and both times they’ve managed to turn the proverbially dreaded tooth pulling into a good and peaceful  experience. I felt taken care of from start to finish. Dr. Shah is knowledgeable, thorough,  and honest. I’d recommend them to anyone.

name: Eshanta Calhoun
text: I went here on Friday, Feb. 7th to have wisdom teeth surgery for 3 wisdom teeth. My 4th wisdom tooth has been extracted about 4 years ago by another dentist.   Back to this office, on the day of the surgery, everything went well, well so I thought. My appointment for surgery was 1:00pm. I didn’t get called back until about 1:45pm. No big deal since I cleared my schedule for the rest of the day.  About 4 days after my surgery, I started experiencing numbness on my top left gum. I called and I asked to speak to Dr. Bannon but the representative gave the phone to his nurse, Natalie. This happened twice. I called on Monday 2/10/2020 and Tuesday 2/11/2020.  Since I couldn’t speak to Dr. Bannon, I asked if I could or would have a follow up appointment. Natalie stated that they do not typically do follow up appointments on wisdom teeth so she didn’t book me a follow up. I understand he is busy and may not have time to talk with patients. Also, I respect all nurses but I would have like to have spoke to the surgeon  at this point who perform my surgery because I am in so much discomfort with this feeling of numbness. I am worried that I could have nerve damage and I want to have a piece of mind speaking to Dr. Bannon. Today, 2/13/2020, I stood firm with my request and book an appointment to speak with him. Another representative booked me an appointment for today at 3:30. I will provide an update once I see Dr. Bannon.

name: Kristy Willis
text: Dr. Shah and his staff are incredible!!! I have had two procedures performed by him and I have been pleased with both. If you are looking for a professional oral surgeon with a great bedside manner, look no further! His staff even calls to check on you a few hours after surgery. They all go above and beyond! I highly recommend Dr. Shah!

name: Kimberley Williams
text: I do not recommend Dr. Shah.  I tried to ask Dr. Shah several questions about the surgical procedure we were discussing that I was going to have.  He told me he had other patients waiting and had no time to answer me.  He responded to another question I asked by saying he couldn't explain to me everything he had learned.  I wouldn't take my dog to Dr Shah.  He was unprofessional, out of line, and his manner and handling of my visit is a disgrace to the dental profession.  I have no confidence in his abilities or in his ethics nor his character.  I deserve to have my questions answered and he has an ethical responsibility to fully address my questions.  To walk out without answering my questions and to tell me he has other patients is just WRONG!

name: Karstyn Pope
text: Dr. Shah & his staff are wonderful! Each time ive been (twice as a patient & once as a driver) these people were nothing short of amazing. Surgery day I was kept calm and comfortable (I'm a nervous dentist visitor) the procedure went quickly. Everyone was so kind.. All the way down to the phone call several hours after I got home to ask how I was feeling! They are great!!

name: doris breasseale
text: Everyone very professional, very friendly.  Waiting room very clean as well as the exam room.  Highly recommend.

name: Richard Mohr
text: I would like to commend the work that Dr Guffey and his staff did during my recent first time visit. They were very professional, pleasant and highly qualified. I had a surgical extraction and from the time I went in till 3 days after I have had very little to no pain or problems. Very good work girls and guy.

name: Tonichia Gayle
text: I would not recommend Dr. Shah. My overall experience with him and the office staff was not pleasant. I actually cancelled my appt for additional surgery because I did not feel welcome. However, my interaction with Lisa in billing was great. She was pleasant, professional and patient.

name: Susan Qualls
text:
Very pleasant visit!  From the dentist to all staff! I would absolutely
tell friends and family to give you a visit should the need arise!
Thanks to all of you.

name: Larry Jackson
text: My appointment was for an evaluation only. I checked in online ahead of my appointment, so that saved some time. They had an option to do online check at a terminal in the office or paper. I was called back and x-rayed shortly after my arrival. Dr. Rocky was very nice, staff professional. I was out of the office in less than 45 minutes. I’d highly recommend them. I’ll update rating after my procedure!!

name: Carolyn Fittipaldi
text: Doctors are awesome.  Staff is helpful and professional with a smile and a greeting.  I’m glad you have an office on Madison.  You came highly recommended by my dentist.  Can’t go wrong by using this group of professionals.

name: Alannah Gates
text: My husband & I have been trying to get him an appointment to get his wisdom teeth out for WEEKS now. Every time him or I call, we’re told that they will “get back to us.” My husband is trying to get his wisdom teeth out because he is in PAIN. I even called last week and asked the receptionist if she would please leave a note and make him a priority considering we’ve been trying to go for weeks and she said yes not a problem. This is absolutely ridiculous. We’re only even trying to come here since our dentist recommended this one. But maybe we will ask for a different place, somewhere who actually has people that care. 🙄

name: Matt Hansken
text: Great doctors and assistants. Afterward I was in a tolerable amount of pain and took ibuprofen. The billing department was patient and understanding. All around an excellent experience.

name: Russell Barr
text: Dr. Brannon and his staff are very professional. Also very friendly.

name: Rebecca Beshears
text: Dr. Guffey is amazing. Him and his staff have helped me through some hard times with my exstrations. Not only do I put my full trust in him, everytime I have sat in the chair they all make me feel like I am with friends and family. So thankful to have Dr. Guffey for my Oral Surgeon.

name: Leilani Catalan
text: I had a tooth pulled this morning with IV sedation and can't say enough good things about Dr. Shah and the wonderful staff. They all made me feel so comfortable by addressing all my concerns and putting me at ease.  They even did a follow-up to see how I'm doing. Highly recommend.

name: blayde priddy
text: I was very pleased with my visit to this facility.....Rocky Shah was the man who checked me over, and answered all my questions about what I needed to do to improve my outlook for the best health of my teeth....

name: Jim Rogers
text: The entire team is great and very professional. Doc Rocky is the best!

name: Tam
text: As a new patient who has completed your paperwork, your still pushed back 1 hour for an appointment.  Overall not happy with the staff or Doctor.

name: sarah inman
text: Arrived early expecting to wait, but was pleasantly surprised at how quickly I was seen. The staff were knowledgeable, friendly, and polite. Highly recommend.

name: Christina Congo
text: Dr. Shah and his team are fantastic!  He and Miranda made us feel very comfortable at the consultation appointment, and we look forward to a great surgery experience!

name: Gabi Gilchrist
text: Great people! I didn't have to wait long in the waiting room or in the back for the doctor to come in!

name: Gene Gygax
text: Friendly counter service, and the surgeon I saw was quick to see that a drug I was taking could have a negative side effect on the tooth extraction I was contemplating. They got me an appointment elsewhere rather than entertain the risk of complications arising from the drug interaction. I trust these folks.

name: Andrew Grein
text: Great office environment and connected to the hospital, Very Clean and well run from the moment I arrived. This is the best option in town for tooth extraction or oral surgery! Dr. Miller has this running as a well oiled machine!

name: Rosi Rajbhandari
text: Dr. Shah spent quite some time explaining the pros and cons about the surgery I was going to have. It was a very informative appointment.

name: Ferrah Isaacson
text: Great office! Caring staff and doctors. Very organized and efficient! Dr. Shah is the best! I would highly recommend this office.

name: Sherry Davis
text: Very nice and caring Surgeon. I loved Dr. Guffey. He couldn’t fix the problem but he referred me and had them call UAB to schedule a surgery consultation to have the issues fixed.

name: NurseJanie81
text: Work in surgical extraction when my dentist couldn't do it. Staff and Drs are very kind and attentive to my every need and answered all my questions. Highly recommend

name: Kristy Huggins
text:
Do not use this office for anything unless you want to be treated like a drug seeker by Dr Guffey and his nurse.  I had 3 teeth cut out 8/9/18. On their paper they give to their patients it says and I quote "some patients may even require 2 pain pills at one time. If you find you are taking large amounts of pain medicine at frequent intervals, please call our office. If you anticipate needing more prescription medication for the weekend, you must call for a refill during weekday business hours."
I've called their office 3 times today wanting to talk to the nurse or him. Only to get a call back from some lady who obviously missed nursing when they taught it at nursing school I was put on hold two different times always coming back to tell me I needed to take prescription strength ibuprofen. I told her that I can't take prescription strength ibuprofen, my sleeve surgery I had doesn't allow me to. She kept saying the pharmacy wouldn't fill it, it hasn't been long enough in between my prescription from yesterday and today. I'm the one that just had to be put to sleep and have 3 teeth surgically cut out of my mouth. Because that kind of pain is nothing right! I will never use this office again! I should have went to an oral surgeon where they actually care about their patients! I WILL NOT BE BACK! GO SEE DR WILLIAM LITTLEJOHN IN DECATUR INSTEAD! PITIFUL EXCUSE OF A SO CALLED "ORAL SURGEON"!

name: Carol Laney
text: I was recommended to this surgery center,by my dentist because i had a lesion on the side of my tongue,he said looked strange,so i went there.Originally i was referred to another dr.,but he was booked up,so i saw this wonderful dr.,Dr.Jason Miller,DMD.He was very nice,told me everything i asked questions about,and i love his Christian attitude as a Dr.He removed the lesion,it wasn't cancerous,Praise God,and if i ever have to have oral surgery,or facial surgery,i would definitelly try my best to get him.The other drs.i don't know anything about,but i was blessed to have Dr. Milar,as my dr.☺

name: Jeanna Moore
text: Great experience from start to finish.  Dr. Guffy and his staff were very compassionate and caring making sure I was well aware of each step of the dental implant process.  I would definitely recommend this practice to anyone needing an oral surgery.

name: Joshua Schofield
text: Be careful of this practice.  They will not verify your benefits prior to a procedure.  Our bill was 10x higher than our estimate because they failed to verify benefits, failed to notify there was going to be a larger bill, refused to return our phone calls, even after admitting their mistake.  Otherwise, Doctor is good.  But beware of their billing practices.

name: Connie Harris
text: Dr.  Shah and his staff are exceptional! Very caring, painless experience! They even called that evening to check on me!  Highly recommend!

name: Greg Brock
text: It took 30 minutes to fill out all of the info needed to see the doctor. There has to be a better way. The staff was great though.

name: Alison Wydner
text: The doctors and staff are helpful, kind, and knowledgeable. My 4 year old had to visit them and they were so kind to him and made us feel very comfortable.

name: Clay Woods
text: Very polite staff ! Very very busy , but they still got patients back fast. I would recommend these great people to anyone!

name: Kris K
text:
very satisfactory treatment by Dr. Rocky Shah. I recommend  go for  oral and facial surgery.
Thanks

name: Harshad Patel
text:
I know Rocky Shah from Mobile,Alabama.  He is a smart doctor.  Several years ago, I had difficulty getting an appointment.  Told his secretary to get me the appointment now or I may have to go to his house.
His office maintains schedule very well and waiting time is less than ten minutes.

name: gerald field
text: Wait time is reasonable and the staff is courteous.  Dr Guffey answered all my questions and was professional, very skilled, and cared for my health,, safety and anxiety issues.

name: Cynthia Wallace
text: It was so refreshing to see the front desk greeting you with smiles, as well as the Assistants. The Dentist was very professional and we were seen in a timely manner. Thank you

name: Safawo Gullo
text: I highly recommend North Alabama Oral and Facial Surgery. Very professional & friendly personnel. They provide the best service in a caring environment. I had a complex procedure done there and the healing time was remarkably short.

name: Pam Asmakis
text: Simply wonderful.....and who says that about a dentist!?

name: Janet Anderson
text: It would have been great if y’all had a payment plan. Especially for emergencies

name: Maddie Whitesell
text: Very welcoming and professional. Will explain any surgery and explore all the options possible to find the best one!

name: Philip Bridges
text: I have had oral surgery by Dr. Shah on two separate occasions. Very impressed by his skill and his focus on the patient. I highly recommend him.

name: Shekinah Spears
text: My doctor was super sweet but the ladies at the front desk and the nurses were very rude. I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone.

name: Leah Pedersen
text: They're professional and personal at the same time. Dr. Shah was polite and helpful. Definitely worth going to.

name: Diane Duncan
text: Very friendly, compationate, and on time. Doctor took the time to have a conversation on the best approach with pros and cons. Felt like he was looking out for us, instead of drumming up business.

name: Alyssa H
text: Dr Shah removed my daughters wisdom teeth and we had a great experience with him and his staff!

name: Chris Poliquin
text: I am from out of state and have had extractions preformed at other locations, but this is by far the all around best and affordable office i have ever used, the staff is the best from reseption to techs, and DR SHAH is the best. I don't put my name behind people or places very often, but i would recommend this office to anyone!

name: J.Marks
text: DR Shaw Is a Amazing Doctor  But His Nurses Or Rude

name: Robert Carrell
text:
i HAD TO WAIT AN HOUR+.  Otherwise, I had a somewhat satisfactory experience at the office.  Reviewing my options was not on the Dentist's agenda.  He deflected any talk of pulling the bad tooth and replacing it with a partial bridge.  I asked for more info about pulling the tooth, cutting the bridge and installing a partial removable bridge...and he left the exam room.   Later, after talking more with the receptionist, I learned that I should schedule for an early morning appointment because the later the appointment, the more chance of something occurring. (?)  The procedure the oral surgeon recommended  was decidedly "NOT" conservative, as he had stated.  'General anesthesia' and 'conservative' do not belong in the same sentence. Believe me.  I'm board certified in anesthesiology.   General anesthesia is dangerous at best.  Who would be administering the anesthesia?   Cutting and lifting a mucoperiosteal flap and drilling into my mandible to remove the infected tooth as advocated by the Dentist because of an overlying four tooth bridge was not without danger and fear on my part.  Also, he didn't want to adjust or use Lovenol instead of my daily Coumadin dose during the operation.   Drilling into a 73 year old man's bone is not on my top ten in popularity.  This was to be the fifth major procedure I was contemplating on this area, which was the original site of a bone cyst.  I've had bone graft, a $4185.00 bridge placed, and other horrors.  I asked for a long lasting solution and my choice of a partial bridge after cutting the bridge to remove the bad tooth, and installing a partial bridge was not in his best interest apparently.  I discovered that a general dentist can do this procedure, which was my first, and still my only choice.   I have scheduled this procedure with a dentist and my insurance will cover it, unlike the $725+ that I would have to pony up for the oral surgery.  My health insurance company, United Healthcare  would pay for the oral surgery procedure but would not pay for the anesthesia($725). How am I supposed to undergo bone drilling and extraction without general anesthesia???
P.S. I went back to my old dentist, who opted out of UHC because they weren't paying for his work.  Figure that out.   He did a great job.  His name is Dr. Matthew Gibson, on County Line Rd in Madison, Alabama.  It cost me but  I made it through the procedure quite well and am going to have my partial bridge placed.  Good luck to all who venture on the treacherous terrain of health care.  If the insurance company doesn't get you, the "health care provider" will. Get a second opinion and garner professional level advice before embarking on any procedures.

Had I been able to talk to the dr prior to PAYING out of POCKET for a scan that NOONE would even FILE for me with my INSURANCE then maybe I would have known that he would not be able to treat me. ALSO why couldn't he treat this? THIS IS HIS SPECIALTY!? The office staff is TERRIBLE! I have called repeatedly and been told that it has been filed and I can see online it has not plus I have called and nothing has been submitted. I have faxed and mailed paperwork with my portion of the claim filled out and all it needs is the dr portion filled out by their billing staff and again that has gotten me nowhere. My insurance covers office consults 100% and TMJ 100%. x-ray radiology 100%. They said this would not be covered and (office staff) and that is FINE but they can have the curtesy to FILE it like they SAID THEY WOULD! DO NOT USE THIS DR IF IT IS FOR TMJ OR IF THEY TELL YOU TO PAY ANYTHING OUT OF POCKET- REFUSE !
